Requirement_Description: Weekly RIS Compliance Assessment - Logging Real Data
Gap_Description: Audit logging schema exists but application-level integration is NOT implemented. 17 mutation endpoints across 7 routers have no audit trail logging.
Notes: Week 47 2025 assessment - System at 40% compliance for real data logging

Requirement_Description: Record and examine activity in systems containing PHI
Evidence: audit_logs table schema exists; AuditService.py exists but not integrated
Gap_Description: Application does not log PHI access to audit_logs table. All READ operations on credentials and licenses are untracked.
Notes: HIPAA critical requirement - must implement audit middleware

Requirement_Description: Log all CREATE/UPDATE/DELETE operations on PHI
Gap_Description: 17 mutation endpoints (POST/PUT/DELETE/PATCH) across 7 routers have no audit logging integration
Notes: Must add AuditService calls to all mutation endpoints

Requirement_Description: Capture before/after state for all data changes
Evidence: change_events table schema exists; ChangeEventService planned
Gap_Description: Cannot reconstruct entity state at specific timestamps. No time-travel queries possible.
Notes: Phase 2 implementation - enables compliance audits

Requirement_Description: Prevent modification of audit logs
Gap_Description: No database triggers to prevent UPDATE/DELETE on audit_logs, change_events, keystroke_logs tables
Notes: Critical HIPAA gap - audit logs can be tampered with

Requirement_Description: Log all authentication attempts
Gap_Description: Session tokens issued but authentication events not logged to audit_logs table
Notes: Need to integrate auth events with AuditService

Requirement_Description: Enforce data access based on user role
Gap_Description: RLS policies defined but enforcement depends on proper session variable setting
Notes: Test RLS enforcement with all user roles

Requirement_Description: Maintain version history of all credential changes
Gap_Description: credential_versions table exists but not populated by application
Notes: Need to version credentials on each update

Requirement_Description: Track source documents for all extracted data
Gap_Description: Schema exists; partial integration in document parser
Notes: Complete lineage tracking for all parsed fields

Requirement_Description: Collect and monitor system metrics
Gap_Description: CloudWatch log groups defined but not deployed. Application logs not being collected.
Notes: Blocked on AWS production deployment

Requirement_Description: Monitor and alert on application errors
Gap_Description: No CloudWatch alarms configured for CPU, memory, disk, RDS metrics
Notes: Part of P0-1 monitoring deployment

Requirement_Description: Log all notification attempts and outcomes
Gap_Description: Tables exist; SES integration planned but not logging real delivery events
Notes: NOTIF-001 Phase 3 implementation

Requirement_Description: Scan for vulnerable dependencies
Gap_Description: Dependabot configured but automated remediation not in place
Notes: Add automated PR creation for security updates

Requirement_Description: Track all code changes with attribution
Gap_Description: All commits GPG signed; git history maintained as permanent audit trail
Notes: Compliant - 7 year retention

Requirement_Description: Require reviews for all code changes
Gap_Description: CODEOWNERS configured; PR reviews required for protected branches
Notes: Compliant - enforced by GitHub

Requirement_Description: Encrypt PHI fields in database
Gap_Description: Fernet encryption key generated; encrypted fields defined. Need verification that encryption is applied.
Notes: Test that NPI/SSN/DOB fields are encrypted

Requirement_Description: TLS encryption for all data transmission
Gap_Description: SSL certificates configured; HTTPS enforced on all endpoints
Notes: Compliant - TLS 1.2+ enforced

Requirement_Description: Mask PHI in logs and AI inputs
Gap_Description: Redaction rules documented; need verification that they are applied before CloudWatch logging
Notes: Ensure no PHI in CloudWatch logs

Requirement_Description: Centralized secrets with rotation
Gap_Description: Production secret created; EC2 IAM role needs Secrets Manager permissions
Notes: Critical blocker for beta launch

Requirement_Description: Track individual keystrokes on sensitive forms
Gap_Description: Schema exists; implementation deferred as optional for v1
Notes: Optional - implement only if required by audit

Requirement_Description: Track development activity for the week
Gap_Description: 3 commits: SOC2/HIPAA hardening files, CODEOWNERS, workflows, gitignore updates
Notes: Low activity week - infrastructure setup

Requirement_Description: Track compliance task progress
Gap_Description: 23 trackers covering features/bugs/compliance/deployment tasks
Notes: Active tracking of all work items

Requirement_Description: Insufficient logging leading to compliance failure
Gap_Description: 100+ entries in CHANGES_LOG.csv but no database-level audit logging yet
Notes: Primary compliance risk - must implement AUDIT_TRAIL_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN

Requirement_Description: Unauthorized access to PHI
Gap_Description: 2FA not implemented; access controls need enhancement
Notes: Implement MFA before beta launch

Requirement_Description: Overall audit control compliance
Gap_Description: Schema ready (20%), Application integration (0%), Immutability (0%), Real data logging (0%)
Notes: Must complete Phases 1-3 of AUDIT_TRAIL_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN

Requirement_Description: Overall logical access control compliance
Gap_Description: Authentication works; RLS defined; audit logging missing
Notes: Complete audit integration for access events

Requirement_Description: System monitoring compliance
Gap_Description: CloudWatch not deployed; no production monitoring
Notes: Deploy CloudWatch before beta launch

Requirement_Description: Change management audit trail
Gap_Description: Signed commits and PR reviews fully implemented
Notes: Maintain current practices

Requirement_Description: Percentage of real data being logged
Gap_Description: Schema infrastructure at 45% ready. Application integration at 15%. Real data capture at 15%. Must implement audit middleware, change events, and immutability triggers.
Notes: Priority 1: Phase 3 (Immutability) -> Phase 1 (Middleware) -> Phase 2 (Events)

Requirement_Description: Required remediation for compliance
Gap_Description: 1) Implement immutability triggers (2-4h), 2) Deploy audit middleware (8-12h), 3) Integrate AuditService in all routes, 4) Deploy CloudWatch monitoring (16h), 5) Complete secrets migration (16h)
Notes: Total 56-64 hours of critical compliance work required before beta launch
